00065 
00066 #define Usb_unicode(c)                    (Usb_format_mcu_to_usb_data(16, (U16)(c)))
00067 #define Usb_get_dev_desc_pointer()        (&(usb_dev_desc.bLength))
00068 #define Usb_get_dev_desc_length()         (sizeof(usb_dev_desc))
00069 #define Usb_get_conf_desc_pointer()       (&(usb_conf_desc.cfg.bLength))
00070 #define Usb_get_conf_desc_length()        (sizeof(usb_conf_desc))

00073 //_____ U S B    D E F I N E S _____________________________________________
00074 
00075             // USB Device descriptor
00076 #define USB_SPECIFICATION     0x0200
00077 #define DEVICE_CLASS          0                   
00078 #define DEVICE_SUB_CLASS      0                   
00079 #define DEVICE_PROTOCOL       0                   
00080 #define EP_CONTROL_LENGTH     64
00081 #define VENDOR_ID             ATMEL_VID           
00082 #define PRODUCT_ID            ISP_PID
00083 #define RELEASE_NUMBER        0x1000
00084 #define MAN_INDEX             0x01
00085 #define PROD_INDEX            0x02
00086 #define SN_INDEX              0x03
00087 #define NB_CONFIGURATION      1
00088 
00089             // CONFIGURATION
00090 #define NB_INTERFACE       1     
00091 #define CONF_NB            1     
00092 #define CONF_INDEX         0
00093 #define CONF_ATTRIBUTES    USB_CONFIG_SELFPOWERED
00094 #define MAX_POWER          50    // 100 mA
00095 
00096             // USB Interface descriptor
00097 #define INTERFACE_NB             0                  
00098 #define ALTERNATE                0                  
00099 #define NB_ENDPOINT              0                  
00100 #define INTERFACE_CLASS          APPLICATION_CLASS  
00101 #define INTERFACE_SUB_CLASS      DFU_SUBCLASS       
00102 #define INTERFACE_PROTOCOL       DFU_MODE_PROTOCOL  
00103 #define INTERFACE_INDEX          0
00104 
00105             // DFU Functional descriptor
00106 #define DFU_WILL_DETACH             TRUE    
00107 #define DFU_MANIFESTATION_TOLERANT  TRUE    
00108 #define DFU_CAN_UPLOAD              TRUE    
00109 #define DFU_CAN_DNLOAD              TRUE    
00110 #define DFU_DETACH_TIMEOUT          0       
00111 #define DFU_TRANSFER_SIZE           0xFFFF  
00112 #define DFU_VERSION                 0x0101  
00113 
00114 #define DEVICE_STATUS         SELF_POWERED
00115 #define INTERFACE_STATUS      0x00 // TBD
00116 
00117 #define LANG_ID               0x00
00118 
00119 #define USB_MN_LENGTH         5
00120 #define USB_MANUFACTURER_NAME \
00121 {\
00122   Usb_unicode('A'),\
00123   Usb_unicode('T'),\
00124   Usb_unicode('M'),\
00125   Usb_unicode('E'),\
00126   Usb_unicode('L') \
00127 }
00128 
00129 #if   __GNUC__     && (__AVR32_UC3A0128__ ||                                   \
00130                        __AVR32_UC3A0256__ ||                                   \
00131                        __AVR32_UC3A0512__ ||                                   \
00132                        __AVR32_UC3A1128__ ||                                   \
00133                        __AVR32_UC3A1256__ ||                                   \
00134                        __AVR32_UC3A1512__) ||                                  \
00135       __ICCAVR32__ && (__AT32UC3A0128__   ||                                   \
00136                        __AT32UC3A0256__   ||                                   \
00137                        __AT32UC3A0512__   ||                                   \
00138                        __AT32UC3A1128__   ||                                   \
00139                        __AT32UC3A1256__   ||                                   \
00140                        __AT32UC3A1512__  )
00141   #define USB_PART_FAMILY_NAME  Usb_unicode('A'),\
00142                                 Usb_unicode('T'),\
00143                                 Usb_unicode('3'),\
00144                                 Usb_unicode('2'),\
00145                                 Usb_unicode('U'),\
00146                                 Usb_unicode('C'),\
00147                                 Usb_unicode('3'),\
00148                                 Usb_unicode('A')
00149 #elif __GNUC__     && (__AVR32_UC3B064__  ||                                   \
00150                        __AVR32_UC3B0128__ ||                                   \
00151                        __AVR32_UC3B0256__ ||                                   \
00152                        __AVR32_UC3B164__  ||                                   \
00153                        __AVR32_UC3B1128__ ||                                   \
00154                        __AVR32_UC3B1256__) ||                                  \
00155       __ICCAVR32__ && (__AT32UC3B064__    ||                                   \
00156                        __AT32UC3B0128__   ||                                   \
00157                        __AT32UC3B0256__   ||                                   \
00158                        __AT32UC3B164__    ||                                   \
00159                        __AT32UC3B1128__   ||                                   \
00160                        __AT32UC3B1256__  )
00161   #define USB_PART_FAMILY_NAME  Usb_unicode('A'),\
00162                                 Usb_unicode('T'),\
00163                                 Usb_unicode('3'),\
00164                                 Usb_unicode('2'),\
00165                                 Usb_unicode('U'),\
00166                                 Usb_unicode('C'),\
00167                                 Usb_unicode('3'),\
00168                                 Usb_unicode('B')
00169 #endif
00170 
00171 #define USB_PN_LENGTH         12
00172 #define USB_PRODUCT_NAME \
00173 {\
00174   USB_PART_FAMILY_NAME,\
00175   Usb_unicode(' '),\
00176   Usb_unicode('D'),\
00177   Usb_unicode('F'),\
00178   Usb_unicode('U') \
00179 }
00180 
00181 #define USB_SN_LENGTH         5
00182 #define USB_SERIAL_NUMBER \
00183 {\
00184   Usb_unicode('1'),\
00185   Usb_unicode('.'),\
00186   Usb_unicode(((((ISP_VERSION >> 4) & 0x0F) < 0xA) ? '0' : 'A' - 0xA) + ((ISP_VERSION >> 4) & 0x0F)),\
00187   Usb_unicode('.'),\
00188   Usb_unicode((((ISP_VERSION & 0x0F) < 0xA) ? '0' : 'A' - 0xA) + (ISP_VERSION & 0x0F)) \
00189 }
00190 
00191 #define LANGUAGE_ID           0x0409
00192
